channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Lab Homework 2 : Setup Unity
item.description: This homework was instantly done for me because I already had Unity before. I just had had to download a new version compatible with the project. So this post will be quite empty because I had nothing to do here

item.title: Lab Homework 1 : Setup Blog
item.description: For my blog, I used Hugo. I chose Hugo because it was my first blog and everything about the setup was explain in the slides so it wasn’t too hard to setup the blog. The theme that I used is named binario. I didn’t encounter major obstacles since each steps of the setup was explained in the slides. The few problems I had are stupid mistakes with Git and mistakes when testing the blog.
